title: Early American civilizations (Mayan, Aztec, Incan)
brief_description: A description of three important civilisations that flourished before the Spanish conquest in the new world - Mayan, Aztec and Incan. This film stresses the economic background shared by all three cultures, an economy based on corn. Shows Mayan carvings, the Teotihuacano’s Pyramid of the Sun, the Aztec calendar stone, Incan weavings and other art objects and ruins.
